name: Kozue Yusa (iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls) LoRA
description:
The sleepy idol makes her LoRA debut! Made using Hollowstrawberry's LoRA training guide and colabs. Trained on ~100 images at around 2000 steps.

DETAILS

  • This LoRA works best at weight 1 (one)

  • The trigger word is kozue

    • Add white hair, green eyes to consistently get accurate hair and eyes, but this not necessary as most of the time the LoRA will do it on its own

    • Add brown dress, puffy short sleeves, buttons to get her default outfit (or something that looks very similar)

  • Incredibly flexible and is compatible with many different outfits and styles

    • Compatible with other LoRAs

  • Tested with AOM3 and anythingv5

  • Embeddings used are EasyNegative and badhandv4 (not required)

modelVersions.name: v1.0
trainedWords: brown dress, puffy short sleeves, buttons

meta.prompt: (masterpiece:1.3), (best quality:1.2), (illustration:1.2), 1girl, solo, <lora:kozueYusa:1>, kozue, flat chest, light smile, looking at viewer, brown dress, white puffy short sleeves, white hair, green eyes, outdoors, buttons,
meta.negativePrompt: EasyNegative, badhandv4, worst quality, (low quality:1.4), watermark, signature, (japanese text:1.3), (english text:1.3), text, bar censor, censored, long sleeves,
